articles.author: Victoria Atkinson
articles.title: The shape of light: Scientists reveal image of an individual photon for 1st time ever - Livescience.com
articles.description: Using a groundbreaking new technique, researchers have unveiled the first detailed image of a photon — a single particle of light — ever taken.
articles.content: Researchers in Birmingham have created the first image of a photon, a lemon-shaped particle of light emitted from the surface of a nanoparticle. The theory that made this image possible, reported Nov… [+4301 chars]
